    • openOWlFile

      public void openOWlFile() throws IOException
      when open(.owl) button is cliked, user can selected an owl file and set the ontolgyDAO with this file. the label pathOwl will be set with the owl file path
      Throws:
      IOException - and a alert frame display

    • loadButtonPressed

      public void loadButtonPressed()
      when the load button is pressed. if a owl file was selected, value of rootListBox, auto and inverted check box are store in static variable before closing the stage, else a red label appear
